title: Noor Community Sandbox Archetypes
description: Canonical slide archetypes used by the Sandbox deck system with layout, typographic, and icon guidance.

archetypes.title: Hero overlay intro
archetypes.summary: Full-bleed hero image with overlay card that introduces the scenario, hook, and key question.
archetypes.usage: Open a deck with visual impact and frame the essential question.

visual.grid: Full-bleed background image with overlay card sized by --content-max-width and stack spacing.
visual.alignment: Overlay card anchors left/top on desktop and centers below 720px via .is-centered-stage.
typography: Display headings use --font-display with h1/h2 sizing from --step-3 and --step-2.
color: Background image tinted by --surface-overlay-strong via lesson-slide--has-overlay.
Overlay card uses --surface-overlay-light with ink text.

constraints: Keep overlay copy under 420 characters to avoid overflow on 16:9 aspect.
Use imagery with focal point in upper-left third to avoid cropping behind overlay.

archetypes.title: Grounding ritual
archetypes.summary: Soft card that sequences numbered settling steps for lesson arrival routines.
archetypes.usage: Guide mindful openings or breathing exercises in synchronous sessions.

visual.grid: Single column stack with .grounding-steps list styled as grid rows inside card.
visual.alignment: Header stays top-left; list stretches full width with evenly spaced badges.

constraints: Limit to 4-5 steps to preserve vertical rhythm on smaller screens.
Avoid imagery behind card to maintain calm tone.

archetypes.title: Lesson aims + communicative goal
archetypes.summary: Carded bullet list with icon chips that foreground outcomes and communicative purpose.
archetypes.usage: State lesson intentions and connect them to real-world performance.

visual.grid: Header plus .lesson-goals card using flex column with icon/text pairs.
visual.alignment: Goal list snaps to center column using --content-max-width.
typography: List items use --font-body at --step-0 with bold lead words.

constraints: 3-4 goals recommended; additional items wrap but reduce readability.
Communicative goal paragraph limited to two sentences.

archetypes.title: Scenario split with media
archetypes.summary: Two-column card mixing scenario context, preparation/performance steps, and optional photo tile.
archetypes.usage: Brief learners on real-world tasks while keeping visual anchor at the side.

visual.grid: Responsive column-card + instruction list using .two-column-grid behaviour via flex on wider viewports.
visual.alignment: Instruction list left aligns while support card or image can snap right.
typography: Instruction copy uses --font-body at --step-0 with bold labels.
color: Instruction icons adopt contextual Font Awesome glyphs with --primary-forest color.

constraints: Scenario callout truncates after ~120 characters; move long context into preparation text.
Optional media slot expects 4:3 imagery for best fit.

archetypes.title: Interactive checkpoint
archetypes.summary: Practice slide with instructions, ordered prompts, and optional embedded module host.
archetypes.usage: Capture quick formative checks that pair list prompts with H5P-style embeds.

visual.grid: Header + .practice-body split into instructions, questions, and module host sections.
visual.alignment: Questions render as ordered list with consistent gutter spacing.
typography: Prompts use --font-body at --step-0; answers flagged with .practice-answer styling.
color: Module host area framed with dashed border and hover-sage background.

constraints: Embed area accepts a single module; addBtn hides once module is present.
Provide at most five prompts to preserve scroll-free desktop layout.

archetypes.title: Task report board
archetypes.summary: Dual-column recap board that balances reporter responsibilities with listening prompts.
archetypes.usage: Structure whole-class share-outs after group work.

visual.grid: Primary column-card for presenting group plus secondary column-card for listeners.
visual.alignment: Cards sit in responsive grid using flex; collapse stacked on mobile.
color: Column dividers use --border-soft and accent icons for emphasis.

constraints: Presenter notes limited to three bullets to prevent overflow.
Listening column should keep prompts under 160 characters each.

archetypes.title: 3-2-1 reflection
archetypes.summary: Stacked card with numbered prompts encouraging quick look-back moments.
archetypes.usage: Close lessons or asynchronous tasks with structured journaling.

visual.grid: Single card with .reflection-prompts list styled for stacked paragraphs.
visual.alignment: Body text stays centered horizontally via --content-max-width.
typography: Prompt copy uses --font-body at --step-0 with bold numerals.
color: Card background uses --surface-card with subtle shadow var(--shadow-1).
Numerals rely on var(--primary-forest) for emphasis.

constraints: Maintain three prompt blocks; adjust numbers but keep stacked rhythm.
Encourage asynchronous use by pairing with chat or journaling instructions.

archetypes.title: Card stack sprint
archetypes.summary: Pill heading plus trio of stack cards for sequencing processes or workflows.
archetypes.usage: Map stepwise routines or highlight multi-stage sprints.

visual.grid: Header stack followed by .card-stack-list using flex column with stack spacing modifiers.
visual.alignment: Cards stretch full width but cap at --card-max-width.
color: Pill uses accent palette and icon chip from --primary-forest.
Cards share --surface-card background with subtle drop shadow.

constraints: Limit to 3-4 cards for comfortable scanning.
Use concise verbs for card headings (max 32 characters).

archetypes.title: Pill gallery showcase
archetypes.summary: Scenario pill paired with masonry-style gallery tiles and captions.
archetypes.usage: Showcase evidence or scenario references alongside a guiding pill.

visual.grid: Header stack plus .pill-gallery-grid using responsive auto-fit columns.
visual.alignment: Captions left align beneath each figure and wrap gracefully on mobile.
typography: Lead paragraph uses --font-body at --step-0 with medium weight.
color: Pill uses accent color with white text.
Gallery frames rely on --surface-card and border-sage.

constraints: Provide 3-4 images at 4:3 or 1:1 ratios for best fit.
Alt text required for accessibility; keep captions under 120 characters.
